outputs.output_descr: EU Border Assistance Mission to Moldova and Ukraine, phase 8. The project will assist the Republic of Moldova nad Ukraine in fulfilling their committments under the Europan association process, thus contributing to a peaceful resolution of the Transnistria conflict. The specific objectives are stated int the Description of the action.

EU Border Assistance Mission to Ukraine and Moldova phase 9. The project will assist the Republic of Moldova nad Ukraine in fulfilling their committments under the Europan association process, thus contributing to a peaceful resolution of the Transnistria conflict.

EU Border Assistance Mission to Moldova and Ukraine, phase 7. Management of the Moldovan/Ukrainian State border improved, contribution to the peaceful settlement of the Transnistria conflict delivered. Moldova and Ukraine will receive assistance in fulfilling their committments under the European Neighbourhood Policy Action Plans (ENP AP) and the Partnership and Cooperation Agreements (PCA).

EUBAM - 5, Management of the Moldovan/Ukrainian State border improved, contribution to the peaceful settlement of the Transnistria conflict delivered.
